ricochet.name: ricochet
ricochet.title: Ricochet
ricochet.description: Shots an enemy at range and deals +8 Att damage to random enemy.

bullseye.name: bullseye
bullseye.title: Bullseye
bullseye.description: Concentrates on shooting precision by increasing attack modifier for +20 on 3 turns.

disarm.name: disarm
disarm.title: Disarm
disarm.description: Shoots the enemy's weapon, thus decreasing its attack modifier by -40 on 3 turns.

playing_dirty.name: playing_dirty
playing_dirty.title: Playing dirty
playing_dirty.description: Improvise when shoot, that's the style of playing dirty. Stuns enemy for 1 turn.

remedy.name: remedy
remedy.title: Remedy
remedy.description: Makes a herbal remedy, which heals wounded party member with 20 HP.

poisonous_gas.name: poisonous_gas
poisonous_gas.title: Poisonous gas
poisonous_gas.description: Throws a poison gas to close target which lingers for 3 turns dealing 12 damage.

throw_acid.name: throw_acid
throw_acid.title: Throw acid
throw_acid.description: Preparation of the acid weakens the enemy for 3 turns by decreasing defense by -10.

catalitic_bomb.name: catalitic_bomb
catalitic_bomb.title: Catalitic bomb
catalitic_bomb.description: Throws powerful bomb that deals damage of 16 to all targets in closest rank.

break_defense.name: break_defense
break_defense.title: Break defense
break_defense.description: Armor of enemy is weakened, thus decreasing its defense with -10 by 2 turns.

burning_flames.name: burning_flames
burning_flames.title: Burning flames
burning_flames.description: Mechanical combustion burns close target with flames inflicting 12 damage in 3 turns.

brass_shield.name: brass_shield
brass_shield.title: Brass shield
brass_shield.description: Made by engineering marvel, his poweful shield pertains defense +10 for 3 turns.

shake_ground.name: shake_ground
shake_ground.title: Shake ground
shake_ground.description: By using all of his might, powerful stomp stuns all enemies for 1 turn.

medikit.name: medikit
medikit.title: Medikit
medikit.description: Army medikit bag contains bandages that heal party member for +20 HP.

precision_shot.name: precision_shot
precision_shot.title: Precision shot
precision_shot.description: By high discipline, sharpshooter uses concentration to deal 25 damage to enemy.

bayonet_charge.name: bayonet_charge
bayonet_charge.title: Bayonet change
bayonet_charge.description: Using a bayonet, attack causes bleeding of close target for 3 turns with 12 damage.

battle_cry.name: battle_cry
battle_cry.title: Battle cry
battle_cry.description: Encouraging his comrades, all party members increase their attack by +10 for 2 turns.

ace.name: ace
ace.title: Ace
ace.description: Every good magician has an extra card in her sleeve, and damages the opponent hard with 20.

blind.name: blind
blind.title: Blind
blind.description: Using her wits, a caster spells an enemy with blindness which lower its attack by -40 for 2 turns.

performance.name: performance
performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Distraction is best when an enemy is fool, thus lowering its defense by -10 for 2 turns.

magic_trick.name: magic_trick
magic_trick.title: Magic trick
magic_trick.description: A hare in her hat, a magic trick for delusioned opponent makes it bedazzled for 3 turns.

disappear.name: disappear
disappear.title: Disappear
disappear.description: Using her stealth, she dissapears increasing her defense for +12 by 2 rounds.

backstab.name: backstab
backstab.title: Backstab
backstab.description: Cunning ability makes it possible to sneak through and deal 22 damage to any of the foes.

reaping_cut.name: reaping_cut
reaping_cut.title: Reaping cut
reaping_cut.description: Deals deep injury to the opponent in close combat that bleeds for 3 turns with 12 damage.

throwing_knives.name: throwing_knives
throwing_knives.title: Throwing knives
throwing_knives.description: Deadly knives strike two targets at once dealing 20 damage to the opponents.

enchanting_song.name: enchanting_song
enchanting_song.title: Enchanting song
enchanting_song.description: The song of mermaids enchants sailors and men and they are stunned for 1 turn.

tidal_wave.name: tidal_wave
tidal_wave.title: Tidal wave
tidal_wave.description: A cursed seabound creature calls the tidal wave which deals 10 damage to all in rank.

piercing_laugh.name: piercing_laugh
piercing_laugh.title: Piercing laugh
piercing_laugh.description: Makes annoying sound awful to two beligerents which causes +8 Att damage.

puppet.name: puppet
puppet.title: Puppet
puppet.description: Turns an enemy unit into a puppet, therefore he is stunned for 2 turns.

crow.name: crow
crow.title: Crow
crow.description: Minion of the dark, a crow flies and stings fearfully with 35 damage to enemy.

curse.name: curse
curse.title: Curse
curse.description: Casts a powerful curse, thus decreasing attack modifier for -40 for 3 turns.

fear.name: fear
fear.title: Fear
fear.description: Wendigo strikes fear to your party, making them full of panic defensless for 2 turns.

entangle.name: entangle
entangle.title: Entangle
entangle.description: Wood creature has ability to entangle the enemy which cannot move for 2 turns.

vampire_bite.name: vampire_bite
vampire_bite.title: Vampire bite
vampire_bite.description: Vampires causes attack of bleeding of close target for 3 turns with 12 damage.

blood.name: blood
blood.title: Blood
blood.description: Regenerates health of vampire by drinking human blood for 30 HP.

electric_charge.name: electric_charge
electric_charge.title: Electric charge
electric_charge.description: By using mighty powers, electric charges stun all enemies for 1 turn.

eather.name: eather
eather.title: Eather
eather.description: Throws deadly Eather wind which lingers for 3 turns dealing 15 damage.
